content_title: KUAI is a fully centralized online ordering system
content_description: that emphasizes flexible management, under each business rules and control.
content_benefits_title: How to sell your products over internet
content_benefits_content_1: register your business, customize its profile, manage its products, and the payment and delivery methods. All without ever needing to get in touch with us.
content_benefits_content_2: automatically get a unique link and QR code to use in WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, printing, etc. and direct your customers to your product list so they can order according to your rules.
content_benefits_title_3: Your product list online for free
content_benefits_contet_3: selling over internet does not need to be subject to costly delivery systems or other platforms, we will let you put your product list online using our system totally free of charge.
content_cta_title: KUAI works like the food ordering apps
content_cta_content: but without needing to install any! The system allows you to manage express delivery, over-the-counter delivery, parking lot delivery, room service, and restaurant service, all using an online menu completely contactless and from a cellphone, tablet, or computer.
content_video_title: Experience our system for managing your business
content_video_content_client: Your business and our system from an administrator perspective
content_video_content_user: Your business and the product list to sell online from a client perspective
alert: Thank you for your interest in KUAI, a business advisor will be in contact with you soon!
